Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected result: The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Sepolia.

Test steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Switch to the wallet and open the activity list item.
Expected result: The transaction status, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.

Test steps: In the test dapp, proceed to add token to wallet.
Expected result: A prompt is shown with the token icon, symbol and amount.

Test steps: Confirm the addition of the custom token.

Expected result: The token is shown in the wallet's tokens list. The token icon is shown. The token symbol is shown. The token balance is shown.
